global.title: Temperature Limits
global.description: Set the operating range for your heating system.

data_description.min_egress: Water temperature when heating demand is minimal (e.g., 25째C)
data_description.max_egress: Water temperature at full heating demand (e.g., 55째C)
data_description.min_ignition_level: Heating won't start until demand exceeds this percentage
data_description.solar_threshold: Reduce heating when solar production exceeds this (Watts)
data_description.valve_min_on_time: Minimum time a valve stays open before it can close (minutes)
data_description.valve_min_off_time: Minimum time a valve stays closed before it can open (minutes)
data_description.quiet_mode_max_flow: Maximum flow temperature during the first heating block of the day (0 = disabled)
data_description.quiet_mode_ramp_minutes: Time to gradually increase from quiet mode to normal max flow

zones.title: Add Heating Zone {zone_count}
zones.description: Configure a room or area with its own temperature control.

data_description.zone_name: Give this room a name (e.g., Living Room, Bedroom)
data_description.zone_temp_entity: The thermometer measuring this room's temperature
data_description.zone_valve_entity: The valve or thermostat that controls heating to this room
data_description.zone_window_entity: Pauses heating when on/open (binary sensor or input boolean)
data_description.zone_schedule_entity: Automatically adjust temperature based on time of day
data_description.zone_default_setpoint: Target temperature when no schedule is active
data_description.kp: Higher = faster response, may overshoot (UFH: 5-15, radiators: 20-50)
data_description.ki: Higher = more precise, slower to settle (UFH: 0.01-0.1, radiators: 0.1-0.5)
data_description.ke: Boost heating when it's cold outside (typical: 0.01-0.03)
data_description.zone_solar_drop: Override global solar drop for this zone (leave empty to use global)
data_description.zone_away_temp: Target temperature when away mode activates (requires presence entity in global settings)
data_description.add_another: Enable to add more rooms after this one
